text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia kromi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell grows to a length of 1.7 mm.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
European waters (ERMS scope)
Portuguese Exclusive Economic Zone
Spanish Exclusive Economic Zone : Alboran Sea
text.External links:
"Odostomia (Odostomia) kromi". Gastropods.com. Retrieved 13 November 2011.
